summary: Bleak Falls Rest transforms the bandit tower outside of Bleak Falls Barrow into a live-able and cozy player-home!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b](This is my first uploaded mod and was something I made for myself, but I loved it so much and thought maybe some other people would like it too, so I decided to upload it. I like converting pre-exsisting structures into liveable spaces so let me know if there's a place you want me to do something similar with and I might get to do it for you!)[/b]

This mod turns the bandit tower just before reaching Bleak Falls Barrow into an abandoned, live-able player home, Bleak Falls Rest, out in the white mountain snow.

[size=5][b]-FEATURES-[/b][/size]

-No more bandits. Bleak Falls Rest is abandoned and yours for the taking!

-Now has location marker for easy fast travel!

-All containers are non-respawning. Light, modest amount of storage, but should be plenty for you!

-Bedroll is player-owned. Why take up space with a huge bed when a bedroll is all that is needed?

-Small stable behind tower to keep your horse. Unfortunately, fast-traveling to BFR does not put your horse in the stable. Ride him/her to it! Removed some rocks between the bridge and the mountain to make it passable on Horse.

-Functional cooking pot to cook all of your favorite foods!

-Lovely furniture and decor like a chair looking out the window for that lovely Skyrim view, and a ornate deer skull on the outside of the threshold/doorway!

-Lots of firelit Nordic torches inside AND they have "Wet and Cold" heat-detection support, to help stave off the snow on your clothes and armor!(There may be a spot or two inside the tower where snow will still be visible on player... sorry!)

[size=5][b]-Requirements-[/b][/size]
There should be no requirements needed. Latest Skyrim is usually a good idea though.

[b][size=5]-Bugs/Known Issues-[/size][/b]
If you can help me figure out how ti fix an issue with an asterisk * then please tell me!

/There are a couple of small "blind spots" inside the tower where the "Wet and Cold" heat detection from the torches may not melt the snow off of the player...

*/When fast travelling to the tower, your horse does not go to the stable, but goes awkwardly next to the player.

[b][size=5]-Compatability/Incompatability-[/size][/b]
This should be compatable with whatever, except for other mods that alter/change the tower and it's info, area, etc. Let me know if you find any specific incompatabilities so I can list them!

[b][size=5]-Reccomended Mods-[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?]Wet and Cold[/url][/center]
author: WolffeHalon
